title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\SoftwareConfig
name: SoftwareConfig
description:
Specifies the selection and config of software inside the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.SoftwareConfig

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.image_version
params.description: Optional. The version of software inside the cluster. It must match the regular expression [0-9]+\.[0-9]+. If unspecified, it defaults to the latest version (see Cloud Dataproc Versioning).

params.name: data.properties
params.description: Optional. The properties to set on daemon config files. Property keys are specified in prefix:property format, such as core:fs.defaultFS. The following are supported prefixes and their mappings: capacity-scheduler: capacity-scheduler.xml core: core-site.xml distcp: distcp-default.xml hdfs: hdfs-site.xml hive: hive-site.xml mapred: mapred-site.xml pig: pig.properties spark: spark-defaults.conf * yarn: yarn-site.xml For more information, see Cluster properties.

methods.name: getImageVersion
methods.description:
Optional. The version of software inside the cluster. It must match the regular expression [0-9]+\.[0-9]+. If unspecified, it defaults to the latest version (see Cloud Dataproc Versioning).

Generated from protobuf field string image_version = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Optional. The version of software inside the cluster. It must match the regular expression [0-9]+\.[0-9]+. If unspecified, it defaults to the latest version (see Cloud Dataproc Versioning).

methods.name: getProperties
methods.description:
Optional. The properties to set on daemon config files.

Property keys are specified in prefix:property format, such as core:fs.defaultFS. The following are supported prefixes and their mappings:

  • capacity-scheduler: capacity-scheduler.xml
  • core: core-site.xml
  • distcp: distcp-default.xml
  • hdfs: hdfs-site.xml
  • hive: hive-site.xml
  • mapred: mapred-site.xml
  • pig: pig.properties
  • spark: spark-defaults.conf
  • yarn: yarn-site.xml For more information, see Cluster properties.
